GetProperties.description: Retrieves the values of the given properties

Shutdown.description: Shuts the system running Kodi down

Hibernate.description: Puts the system running Kodi into hibernate mode

EjectOpticalDrive.description: Ejects or closes the optical disc drive (if available)

GetProperties.description: Retrieves the values of the given properties

GetStereoscopicModes.description: Returns the supported stereoscopic modes of the GUI

GetProperties.description: Retrieves the values of the given properties

displaytime.description: The time in milliseconds the notification will be visible

SetStereoscopicMode.description: Sets the stereoscopic mode of the GUI to the given mode

path.description: Required for media and script favourites types

AddFavourite.description: Add a favourite with the given details

SetRepeat.description: Set the repeat mode of the player

PlayPause.description: Pauses or unpause playback and returns the new state

SetSpeed.description: Set the speed of the current playback

GetPlayers.description: Get a list of available players

GetProperties.description: Retrieves the values of the given properties

Open.description: Start playback of either the playlist with the given ID, a slideshow with the pictures from the given directory or a single file or an item from the database.

enable.description: Whether to enable subtitles to be displayed after setting the new subtitle

SetSubtitle.description: Set the subtitle displayed by the player

Move.description: If picture is zoomed move viewport left/right/up/down otherwise skip previous/next

GoTo.description: Go to previous/next/specific item in the playlist

SetAudioStream.description: Set the audio stream played by the player

GetSettingValue.description: Retrieves the value of a setting

SetSettingValue.description: Changes the value of a setting

ResetSettingValue.description: Resets the value of a setting

GetTVShowDetails.description: Retrieve details about a specific tv show

SetMusicVideoDetails.description: Update the given music video with the given details

RemoveMovie.description: Removes the given movie from the library

SetMovieDetails.description: Update the given movie with the given details

RemoveEpisode.description: Removes the given episode from the library

GetMovieSetDetails.description: Retrieve details about a specific movie set

SetMovieSetDetails.description: Update the given movie set with the given details

GetEpisodeDetails.description: Retrieve details about a specific tv show episode

RemoveTVShow.description: Removes the given tv show from the library

showdialogs.description: Whether or not to show the progress bar or any other GUI dialog

Clean.description: Cleans the video library from non-existent items

SetEpisodeDetails.description: Update the given episode with the given details

RemoveMusicVideo.description: Removes the given music video from the library

SetSeasonDetails.description: Update the given season with the given details

GetSeasonDetails.description: Retrieve details about a specific tv show season

SetTVShowDetails.description: Update the given tvshow with the given details

GetRecentlyAddedMusicVideos.description: Retrieve all recently added music videos

GetMusicVideoDetails.description: Retrieve details about a specific music video

showdialogs.description: Whether or not to show the progress bar or any other GUI dialog

Scan.description: Scans the video sources for new library items

Export.description: Exports all items from the video library

GetRecentlyAddedEpisodes.description: Retrieve all recently added tv episodes

GetMovieDetails.description: Retrieve details about a specific movie

GetBroadcasts.description: Retrieves the program of a specific channel

GetChannelDetails.description: Retrieves the details of a specific channel

GetRecordingDetails.description: Retrieves the details of a specific recording

GetTimerDetails.description: Retrieves the details of a specific timer

GetBroadcastDetails.description: Retrieves the details of a specific broadcast

GetChannelGroups.description: Retrieves the channel groups for the specified type

GetProperties.description: Retrieves the values of the given properties

GetChannelGroupDetails.description: Retrieves the details of a specific channel group

ShowOSD.description: Show the on-screen display for the current player

Home.description: Goes to home window in GUI

done.description: Whether this is the whole input or not (closes an open input dialog if true).

ShowCodec.description: Show codec information of the playing item

GetInfoBooleans.description: Retrieve info booleans about Kodi and the system

labels.description: See http://kodi.wiki/view/InfoLabels for a list of possible info labels

GetInfoLabels.description: Retrieve info labels about Kodi and the system

GetAlbums.description: Retrieve all albums from specified artist or genre

GetArtistDetails.description: Retrieve details about a specific artist

GetSongs.description: Retrieve all songs from specified album, artist or genre

SetSongDetails.description: Update the given song with the given details

showdialogs.description: Whether or not to show the progress bar or any other GUI dialog

Scan.description: Scans the audio sources for new library items

Export.description: Exports all items from the audio library

albumartistsonly.description: Whether or not to include artists only appearing in compilations. If the parameter is not passed or is passed as null the GUI setting will be used

albumlimit.description: The amount of recently added albums from which to return the songs

GetSongDetails.description: Retrieve details about a specific song

SetAlbumDetails.description: Update the given album with the given details

GetAlbumDetails.description: Retrieve details about a specific album

SetArtistDetails.description: Update the given artist with the given details

showdialogs.description: Whether or not to show the progress bar or any other GUI dialog

Clean.description: Cleans the audio library from non-existent items

Insert.description: Insert item(s) into playlist. Does not work for picture playlists (aka slideshows).

GetProperties.description: Retrieves the values of the given properties

Remove.description: Remove item from playlist. Does not work for picture playlists (aka slideshows).

Swap.description: Swap items in the playlist. Does not work for picture playlists (aka slideshows).

GetSources.description: Get the sources of the media windows

limits.description: Limits are applied after getting the directory content thus retrieval is not faster when they are applied.

GetDirectory.description: Get the directories and files in the given directory

GetFileDetails.description: Get details for a specific file

PrepareDownload.description: Provides a way to download a given file (e.g. providing an URL to the real file location)

GetAddonDetails.description: Gets the details of a specific addon

content.description: Content provided by the addon. Only considered for plugins and scripts.

ExecuteAddon.description: Executes the given addon with the given parameters (if possible)

json_rpc.description: Takes all vars and puts them in a body JSON object
